MULT(6D)                                               MULT(6D)





NAME
       mult - multiply two images

SYNOPSIS
       mult inimage1 inimage2 outimage

DESCRIPTION
       mult  multiplies  two  images.  The value 255 is used to
       represent 1.0 while 0 represents 0.0.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004                  MULT(6D)
